name: OpenDocument Text Document Format (ODT), Version 1.2.  Part of OASIS Open Document Format for Office Applications, Version 1.2 and the equivalent ISO 26300-1:2015.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">odt, ott, odm</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: An XML-based format for editable textual documents, usually with .odt as file extension. Part of the OpenDocument Format (ODF) family.  Documented in ODF 1.2 Part 1.  Component files are packaged using a constrained version of the ZIP format.  Incorporates an XML-based manifest file to list component files.
